question: What companies experienced an uptick in hiring for data-related positions just after closing strategic vendor partnerships?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have closed strategic vendor partnerships. [CompanyDealMaster]
Analyze hiring data to find upticks in data-related positions. [CompanyHiringDetail]
Correlate the hiring upticks with the timing of the vendor partnerships. [CompanyHiringDetail, CompanyDealMaster]
